name: Starlinked
description:
GOAL

Survive as long as possible and collect as many stars as possible.

Collect green stars with the green ship and yellow stars with the big ship.

Collect moons with the particle connection between the ships

AVOID black holes and alien ships

CONTROLLS

Use W,A,S,D to move

Hold SPACE to pull both ships together

Press SPACE once to disconnect the ships

Press LEFT MOUSEBUTTON to gain control over the other ship
